languages.text: "Видимо, мы и правда с вами из разного теста слеплены, если вы находите повод для радости в том, что из-за одного ублюдка вместо вас дохнут отчаявшиеся люди".

traits.locale_text: "Видимо, мы и правда с вами из разного теста слеплены, если вы находите повод для радости в том, что из-за одного ублюдка вместо вас дохнут отчаявшиеся люди".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."
languages.original_text: "Видимо, мы и правда с вами из разного теста слеплены, если вы находите повод для радости в том, что из-за одного ублюдка вместо вас дохнут отчаявшиеся люди".

traits.locale_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate slobs in your stead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate slobs in your stead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate slobs in your stead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate slobs in your stead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「悪党が、自分の代わりに絶望にある者たちを虐殺する様を見て慰めを得るというのなら、あなたと私はまったく違う人間なのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."

traits.locale_text: 「悪党が、自分の代わりに絶望にある者たちを虐殺する様を見て慰めを得るというのなら、あなたと私はまったく違う人間なのでしょう」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “那个渣滓不再打您的主意，而是将剩下那些走投无路的人送上屠宰场。如果您能从这种事情中找到慰藉，那我们肯定不是一路人。”
languages.original_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."

traits.locale_text: “那个渣滓不再打您的主意，而是将剩下那些走投无路的人送上屠宰场。如果您能从这种事情中找到慰藉，那我们肯定不是一路人。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Debemos de ser personas muy diferentes si encuentra consuelo en ver cómo un canalla masacra a gente desesperada en tu lugar».
languages.original_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."

traits.locale_text: «Debemos de ser personas muy diferentes si encuentra consuelo en ver cómo un canalla masacra a patanes desesperados en tu lugar».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Wir beide sind wohl sehr unterschiedlich, wenn Ihr Trost darin findet, einem Schuft zuzusehen, der statt Euch verzweifelte Leute massakriert."
languages.original_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."

traits.locale_text: "Wir beide sind wohl sehr unterschiedlich, wenn Ihr Trost darin findet, einem Schuft zuzusehen, wie er statt Euch andere verzweifelte Pechvögel massakriert."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Si vous vous réjouissez de voir une raclure de fond de bidet envoyer au massacre des pauvres malheureux, alors vous et moi sommes plus différents que ce que je croyais. »
languages.original_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous vous réjouissez de voir une raclure de fond de bidet envoyer au massacre des pauvres malheureux, alors vous et moi sommes plus différents que ce que je croyais. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Bir hainin sizin yerinize biçare insanları katledişini izlemekte teselli bulabiliyorsanız sizden çok farklı olmalıyım."
languages.original_text: "You and I must be very different people if you find solace in watching a scoundrel massacre desperate people in your stead."

traits.locale_text: "Bir hainin sizin yerinize biçare insanları katledişini izlemekte teselli bulabiliyorsanız biz çok farklı insanlar olsak gerek."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
